ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Re: Bertoxx Bards
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Lol. Yea, I agree, soloing isn t all that exciting. City of Mist is pretty fun, but at your hours you won t find any pickup groups. Grouping in Dreadlands
ygData.messageBody:
At 08:20 AM 10/16/00 +0200, you wrote:

> >Message: 10
> > Date: Fri, 13 Oct 2000 13:28:33 -0700
> > From: John Tatsukawa <john@...>
> >Subject: Re: Bertoxx Bards
> >
> >Aye Musiker is on occasionally. Convinced him to do some soloing in
> >Dreadlands. Last I saw, he was 40.
> >
>
>Hehe, You dident convince me to do some soloing *Grin* I almost NEVER solo. I
>hate soloing, its too damned boring IMO.
>I have started to hunt with groups in Dreadlands, on the north wall of
>karnor to
>be precise. I still find that 3 spawn in Overthere gives me better experince
>overall + I have just about hunted so many berzerkers that I am able to enter
>the outpost without my mask (They con threathingly without the mask) So I
>think
>I will do my last bubble of hell (40th) in OT.
>Btw I almost never have problems finding a group. Only problem is that the
>zones
>where people hunt during my playhours, are the same well known zones which is
>tottaly crowded during peek hours. I guess thats the curse of playing on the
>hours where there is less than 1k people on the server - I seldom get to fight
>in the less populated zones like dalnir.

Lol. Yea, I agree, soloing isn't all that exciting. City of Mist is pretty
fun, but at your hours you won't find any pickup groups. Grouping in
Dreadlands gives far less exp than soloing in Dreadlands, naturally. Where
is the 3 spawn in the Overthere? There's some person on Bertox who has been
pretty obnoxious in the past at the 3 spawn (just listening to him on the
"shout" chat) so I avoided the "3 spawn".

Windleaf
